entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Provide alignment guarantees for embedded binary data #61259
  • ValueTuple reference location does not work for .NET 6.0 completion test #61258
  • 'Convert to interpolated string' produces nonsense when involving raw string literal #61256
  • Static virtual members of interfaces are not included into completion list on a type parameter #61255
  • Compiler needs to declaratively fail when loading newer analyzers #61252
    17.3
  • Compiler should treat `and`/`or` as keywords when matching enum in incomplete trees #61246
  • Compiler produces weird error in bad pattern matching #61245
  • [LSP] Semantic tokens flickering #61239
  • Compiler should warn on `foreach (ref T2 t2 in enumThatIsRefT1)` #61238
  • [LSP] Simplify semantic tokens token types legend #61237
  • Remove `AssemblySymbol.RuntimeSupportsNumericIntPtr` once we add `TargetFramework.Net70` #61235
    C# 11.0

Closed

  • ValueTrackingTree visual leaks WPF animation #61186
    17.3
  • .editorconfig dotnet_naming_symbols.constant_fields affects non-constant symbols #61249
    17.3
  • Better conversion target rules should be updated for nint/nuint #61199
    17.3
  • Microsoft.NetCore.Compilers packages do not support Arm64 runtimes #29126
  • Revert FixAll support for Invert conditional refactoring #60956
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Move off of IOperation in speculation analyzer. #61257
    Area-IDE
  • Allow creating SourceText from a StringBuilder #61251
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Bump macos workload to RC3 #61250
    Area-IDE
  • Update FindRefs API to support searching for multiple symbols at the same time. #61248
    Area-IDE
  • Fix several LSP completion kind mappings #61243
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add FixAll support for UseExpressionBody/BlockBody refactoring #61240
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Recommend 'static' and 'virtual' after each other in an interface. #61253
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Fix WPF issue with indeterminate progress bar #61254
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required, Next
  • Add support for re-abstraction of operators in derived interfaces. #61244
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Simplify RegexCharClass.IsWordChar #61242
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Revert "Improve editorconfig options caching on ProjectState" #61216
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Work around project system bug #61247
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Avoid yield in ReadAsync/WriteAsync unless on main thread #61187
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add FixAll support for "Convert to raw string" refactoring #61105
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61236
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61260
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • More SyntaxContext sharing among CompletionProviders #61221
    Area-IDE
  • Fix focus on rename UI opening #60846
    Area-IDE
  • ✨ Implement SegmentedHashSet<T> #54574
    Area-Compilers
  • Ref fields escape analysis #61195
    Area-Compilers
  • Test the EditorFeatures layer on net472 and net6.0-windows #61234
    Area-IDE
  • File types binding #60977
    Area-Compilers
  • Remaining fallback options #60888
    Area-IDE
  • Unify nint and IntPtr #60913
    Area-Compilers
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove document options provider #61228
    Area-IDE
  • Synthesize a method that throws when a method is deleted in EnC [Alternate] #61160
    Area-Compilers
  • Handle some possible null-references #61132
    Area-Compilers
  • Add FixAll in Project and Solution support for AddFileBanner refactoring #61208
    Area-Analyzers
  • [EE] Implement IDkmClrFullNameProvider2 in Roslyn's ResultProvider Formatter. #60522
    Area-Interactive, Community
  • Fix nested in generic type binding issues in enabled nullability context #61182
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add new collapsing option for metadata files that contain source #61205
    Area-IDE
  • Add pointer for `AnalysisLevel` to warning waves doc #61196
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Fix for Issue #55606: [EE] Format IAsyncEnumerable method names correctly. #61211
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams
  • Improve SyntaxNormalizer performance #50778
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for CompilerFeatureRequiredAttribute #61113
    Area-Compilers
  • [LSP] Add JSON semantic token classifications #61231
    Area-IDE
